item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - HAIM - Days Are Gone (10th Anniversary Edition) [2023]
item.description:
Album Artist(s): HAIM
Title: Days Are Gone (10th Anniversary Edition)
Year of Release: 2023
Genre(s): Pop-Rock, Alternative
The cover above is custom but, the original is also included.​
Disc 1
  1. Falling
  2. Forever
  3. The Wire
  4. If I Could Change Your Mind
  5. Honey & I
  6. Don’t Save Me
  7. Days Are Gone
  8. My Song 5
  9. Go Slow
  10. Let Me Go
  11. Running If You Call My Name
Disc 2
  1. Better Off
  2. Send Me Down
  3. Edge
  4. Go Slow (Demo)
  5. Falling (Duke Dumont Remix)
  6. Don’t Save Me (Cyril Hahn Remix)
  7. Forever (Giorgio Moroder Remix)
  8. If I Could Change Your Mind (Cerrone Funk Remix)
